TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyValueStoreEnumerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Reads the local store contents of a secondary replica within the context of a copy completion callback. .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.Fabric.KeyValueStoreItem> Enumerate(string keyPrefix) cil managed

param.name: keyPrefix
param.para: Specifies an optional key-prefix filter to apply during enumeration.

summary.para: Enumerates the local store contents and includes the data value for all enumerated key-value pairs.

returns.para: An enumerator over the local store contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.Fabric.KeyValueStoreItem> Enumerate(string keyPrefix, bool strictPrefix) cil managed

param.name: keyPrefix
param.para: Specifies an optional key-prefix filter to apply during enumeration.

param.name: strictPrefix
param.para: When true, only keys prefixed by the value specified for keyPrefix are returned. Otherwise, enumeration starts at the first key matching or lexicographically greater than keyPrefix and continues until there are no more keys. The default is true.

summary.para: Enumerates the local store contents and includes the data value for all enumerated key-value pairs.

returns.para: An enumerator over the local store contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.Fabric.KeyValueStoreItemMetadata> EnumerateMetadata(string keyPrefix) cil managed

param.name: keyPrefix
param.para: Specifies an optional prefix filter to apply during enumeration.

summary.para: Enumerates the local store contents but excludes the data value for all enumerated key-value pairs.

returns.para: An enumerator over the local store contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.Fabric.KeyValueStoreItemMetadata> EnumerateMetadata(string keyPrefix, bool strictPrefix) cil managed

param.name: keyPrefix
param.para: Specifies an optional key-prefix filter to apply during enumeration.

param.name: strictPrefix
param.para: When true, only keys prefixed by the value specified for keyPrefix are returned. Otherwise, enumeration starts at the first key matching or lexicographically greater than keyPrefix and continues until there are no more keys. The default is true.

summary.para: Enumerates the local store contents but excludes the data value for all enumerated key-value pairs.

returns.para: An enumerator over the local store contents.
